channel.title: Net Hugging Hardware and Software (via bkil-bot)

item.title: Re: Pwnagotchi plugin: I would imaging the same advice as above applies - check your uploads page and see if the pwnagotchi is sending files (correlate it with the logs on your pwnagotchi).As i said everything shows it being sent but nothing in my uploads. -wpa3
Re: Pwnagotchi plugin: I would imaging the same advice as above applies - check your uploads page and see if the pwnagotchi is sending files (correlate it with the logs on your pwnagotchi). -arkasha

Re: Pwnagotchi plugin: looking at https://github.com/evilsocket/pwnagotch ... gle.py#L84, it looks like it expects the "Encoded for use" value from your https://wigle.net/account page This is probably uploading anonymously by default.Thats a shame i have since changed to the Encoded for use value is there anyway to check things are getting uploaded then? I guess it would be better to change the value in the script. -wpa3

Re: Pwnagotchi plugin: looking at https://github.com/evilsocket/pwnagotch ... gle.py#L84, it looks like it expects the "Encoded for use" value from your https://wigle.net/account page This is probably uploading anonymously by default. -arkasha

Re: Pwnagotchi plugin: Assuming you configured your credentials, just check the uploads page! -arkIt only asks for these Code: main.plugins.wigle.enabled = truemain.plugins.wigle.api_key = "RANDOM API KEY"main.plugins.wigle.whitelist = []But nothing was aadded so unsure whats happening honesty. -wpa3

Should I merge database from different phones or keep them seperate ?: Different phones have different antennas and record different signal level for same location. If somehow I figure out on one device -Xdb is Ym away. Keeping database separate will help ? Is there a way to import database from different phone and mark it's origin. -R5ph4
What is "Maxout DB Marker" in Android App ?: "Maxout DB Marker" -R5ph4
Desktop software to view observations ?: With features - 1. Offline - I don't want to upload to wigle.net 2. with different maps like OSM and Google etc. -R5ph4
File Formats: KML vs CSV vs Magic8Ball: KML CSV Magic8Ball - Settings says it's Geolocation but other 2 are DB -R5ph4
Re: Pwnagotchi plugin: Assuming you configured your credentials, just check the uploads page! -ark -arkasha

Pwnagotchi plugin: Started using this plugin Code: https://github.com/evilsocket/pwnagotchi/blob/master/pwnagotchi/plugins/default/wigle.pyGetting this in my logs but unsure if anything is being uploaded to wigle how would I check. Code: [2023-02-28 22:01:21,511] [INFO] WIGLE: Internet connectivity detected. Uploading new handshakes to wigle.net[2023-02-28 22:02:11,282] [INFO] WIGLE: Successfully uploaded 38 filesPS Is anybody else using Pwnagotchi/ https://pwnagotchi.ai/ -wpa3

Re: Creating a driving rig: worth noting that recent Kismet has a proper WiGLE export tool, as well! (dragorn rocks) What's better Vistumbler or Kismet for Wigle reporting?I would say Kismet, depends on what harerdware you plan to run it on. Kismet is pretty powerful. -wpa3
Re: Has anyone run WiGLE inside the windows 11 android subsystem?: I never run WiGLE inside the windows 11 android subsystem before. build now gg -thomasfrank
Re: Creating a driving rig: worth noting that recent Kismet has a proper WiGLE export tool, as well! (dragorn rocks) What's better Vistumbler or Kismet for Wigle reporting? -pretenda

Re: Raspberry Pi War Driving - Automated upload: Hi all, I'm new to the community (2 weeks old) so go easy on me. As my first project I've written a guide on setting up a Raspberry Pi for War Driving. I've also written a script which automates the uploading to Wigle and any other FTP server you may have. I've just published it, so there may be the odd typo so feedback welcome . http://www.pi-resource.com/?page_id=378 Hope it helps! Dusterz automatic upload is exactly what i was searching for. thank you! -HughMungis
